_sText:
zm_Windship

=====================

Description: In a world of fantasy, there are flying ships in the sky. But it's seem that one of the passagers was infected by a zombie virus.

=====================

Author's Note: I'm kinda a fan of fantasy stories. So after watching Avatar the movie,reading some mangas about fantasy, and playing a little part of final fantasy, I got an idea of making this map.

=====================

Special Thanks to: TopHATTwaffle - Waterfall Texture Maximaxou - White Texture Mali15 - Manga Image mpa115 - Skybox Texture

====================

zm_Windship:

zm_Windship:
+ Secret Map Extention
+ Secret AirShip
+ Secret Top Spot

zm_Windship_beta4:
+ New Sailing Pole
+ Remaded cale
+ Remaded captain room
+ Thin Wall repaired

zm_windship_beta3: + Public release + new hideouts + Playable on a server + Reactor remaked + New name - Gameplay still not tested

zm_Fantasyairship_beta2: + Map Fully playable on a server, in multiplayer. + The ship re-textured + 3D Skybox with mini ilands - Ship a bit to empty - Limited Test

zm_Fantasyairship_beta1: + Map playable - Unplayable on multiplayer

================

NOTE: I'm realy needing someone to test the gameplay of this maps , so if you have test it don't forget to feedback :P
